changes.msg: Matrix audition: all 4 chapters × voices, pipelined generation
Add editable Director's Notes to Voice Audition Studio
Add 12 preset sample whispers to Voice Audition dropdown, auto-switches chapter
Fix badge CSS: restore text pills for card badges, circle style only for admin table letters
Move Life of PAI admin to /residents/, fix badge layout, add voice audition prominence + Sonos zones
Life of PAI: Andean cultural rewrite, director's-notes TTS, voice audition tool
Add editable AI prompts and whisper regeneration to Life of PAI admin
Redesign build info: bigger version badge, rich tooltip + modal with bug fix details
Add Claude Opus 4.6 as selectable AI model, cost tracking, and story arc to Life of PAI
Auto-record Zelle overpayments as rent credit + send tenant receipt email
Expand name pool: residents + staff + admins + past residents
Add work schedule whispers and Outhouse zone
Remove SkyBalcony Sound from whisper zones
Remove redundant Rentals/Events/Visiting quick links from contact page
Remove camera talkback UI — G5 PTZ cameras have mics only, no speakers
